constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 147 (Tuesday, August 17, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. KUSTER:
H.R. 5048.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 1 of the United States
Constitution, the Taxing and Spending Clause: ``The Congress
shall have Power To lay and collect Taxes, Duties, Imposts
and Excises, to pay the Debts and provide for the common
Defense and general Welfare of the United States . . .''
[Page H4338]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Nutrition, Oversight, and Department Operations.

title: SNAP Act of 2021
